name: Cocoon jp basins
description: Custom natural stone washbasin designed by John Pawson This dressing table can be customized to fit any width. The inner sink is made from a solid block of marble. Including drain from the same material Available in a wide range of natural marbles. Minimum size: 1000 x 600 mm height: 250 mm Mixer: JP 11.3 Who works in V-Ray version lower than 3.1, be careful, in the materials in the BRDF section there is Microfaset GTR (GGX), if your version is older than 3.1, then the BRDF field will be empty. Choose Blinn, Phong or Ward - which is preferable for you. " If CORONA version is higher than 1.4: â€œFor Corona render, it is recommended to install at least version 1.5, as the glossiness of materials is adjusted with PBR in mind. Show more
